section.name: How Can I Help
section.p:
Every volunteer project gets its strength from its participants. We invite everybody to participate in Cayenne in any way that is suitable for you.
If you are willing to help, you can do it in many different ways:
By contributing code for one or more tasks listsed below
By contributing documentation
By testing Cayenne and reporting bugs
By using Cayenne and reporting bugs
By suggesting your own ideas on the mailing list
If you want to become a contributor, first you should probably subscribe to Cayenne Developer Mailing List. to see what issues are discussed and to communicate with the project team.

Normally code and documentation contributions are made via patches sent to developer list. A good discussion on how to create and submit code patches is located at Jakarta Apache site. You can use all these hints as related to Cayenne.

section.name: Tasks
section.p: For the latest list of tasks visit our task tracker.
